content.rendered:
Holiday Gift Ideas

Make sure to drop by Gottwals Books to complete your holiday shopping list! We have used and new books as well as a wide selection of fun and educational toys. Or choose a traditional holiday gift, such as brand NEW Elf on the Shelf sets that include the classic picture book and your very own Elf! It’s only $19.97 (MSRP $30+). We also sell gift cards!

 

Small Business Saturday

November 25th is Small Business Saturday, a nationwide celebration of the small businesses that make local communities special. Please visit Gottwals Books and all the other locally-owned businesses in Middle Georgia, and remember us as you consider your buying decisions this Christmas.

 

A WONDER-ful Recommendation

The movie Wonder is coming to theaters next week! We recommend grabbing a copy of the YA novel Wonder–we don’t think you’ll regret it!

 

Cookbooks for Bakers and Soup-Makers

Fall–and the upcoming holiday season–means baked goods, savory meals, and warm, hearty soups.  Come in an explore our extensive selection of cookbooks.

 

Thanksgiving Day Hours

We will be CLOSED on Thanksgiving Day. Regular business hours will resume the day after Thanksgiving.
